mapper.select: SELECT S.SUPPORT_NO, S.SUPPORT_TITLE, S.SUPPORT_CONTENT, S.SUPPORT_ANSWER, S.SUPPORT_STATUS, S.MEM_NO, S.ADMIN_NO, S.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE, C.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_NAME, TO_CHAR(S.SUPPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SUPPORT_DATE FROM SUPPORT S LEFT JOIN SUPPORT_CATEGORY C ON S.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE = C.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE ORDER BY S.SUPPORT_NO ASC

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUPPORT WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}) - ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY S.SUPPORT_NO DESC) + 1 AS SEQ_NO, S.SUPPORT_NO, S.SUPPORT_TITLE, S.SUPPORT_CONTENT, S.SUPPORT_ANSWER, S.SUPPORT_STATUS, S.MEM_NO, S.ADMIN_NO, S.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE, C.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_NAME, TO_CHAR(S.SUPPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SUPPORT_DATE FROM SUPPORT S LEFT JOIN SUPPORT_CATEGORY C ON S.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE = C.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE WHERE S.MEM_NO = #{memNo} ORDER BY S.SUPPORT_NO DESC

SELECT S.SUPPORT_NO, S.SUPPORT_TITLE, S.SUPPORT_CONTENT, S.SUPPORT_ANSWER, S.SUPPORT_STATUS, S.MEM_NO, S.ADMIN_NO, S.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE, C.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_NAME, S.SUPPORT_DATE FROM SUPPORT S LEFT JOIN SUPPORT_CATEGORY C ON S.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE = C.SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE WHERE S.SUPPORT_NO = #{supportNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUPPORT ( SUPPORT_NO, SUPPORT_TITLE, SUPPORT_CONTENT, SUPPORT_CATEGORY_CODE, MEM_NO, SUPPORT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SUPPORT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{supportTitle}, #{supportContent}, #{supportCategoryCode}, #{memNo}, SYSDATE )
